name: Earthen Seal Stone
rules: The Pokémon V this card is attached to can use the VSTAR Power on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached.

attacks.name: Star Gravity
attacks.text: Put damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon V until its remaining HP is 100. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)
